Title: The Profession of Arms
Actors: Christo Jivkov, Sergio Grammatico, Dimitar Ratchkov, Fabio Giubbani
Plot: The history of the first victim of modern artillery and its moving agony, amidst conspiracies and betrayals of the powerful. Life and death of Giovanni De' Medici, a young brave captain in the war of Charles V against the Pope, in the first half of 1500.
